Package com.example.myapplication.features.organizer

package com.example.myapplication.features.organizer
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.myapplication.features.organizer.home
     
  • Class
    Description
    OCreateEventFrag
    This class is for users to be able to create new events when they are in their organizer state.
    OCreateFrag
    This class provides the UI for organizers to be able to create an event.
    OEditEventFrag
    Organizer edit event screen.
    OEntrantMapFrag
    Entrant Map Screen.
    OEventDetailFrag
    This class if for displaying the detailed information about an event for a user, when they select an event from the OHomeFrag.
    OEventListAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying a list of participant names (either from the waiting list or final list) in the organizer event screen.
    OEventListAdapter.OnItemLongClickListener
    This interface is a listener for a long-press action on the names in the list
    OEventListFrag
    Fragment that allows an event organizer to view and manage participants on both the waiting list and final list for a specific event.
    OHomeFrag
    Organizer home view that delegates data and filtering to the controller/model.
    ONotiFrag
    This class is responsible for managing organizer notifications and certain event actions.
    OProfileFrag
    This class is for the organizers profile screen.
